title: How do I forward a message or send a message to multiple recipients?
answer: To forward a message: Touch and hold the message, choose Forward from the displayed option menu, enter a recipient, and send the message. [To send a message to multiple recipients:]() Create a message, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111060), select the desired recipients, and touch Add.
